entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain and ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
